reasoning.step2:
GrandTotal.Amount (141.60)
- Evidence: Line "Gesamtbetrag EUR 141,60" clearly present.
- Consistency checks: Sum excl. Mwst. 118,00 + Summe Mwst. 23,60 = 141,60 matches.
- Confidence: Very high (≈98%).

Invoice.Date ("23.11.2023")
- Evidence: "Datum: 23.11.2023" and multiple occurrences of 23.11.2023 (Auftragsdatum, Lieferdatum).
- Consistency checks: Date format consistent and matches other document dates.
- Confidence: Very high (≈99%).

Sender.VatId ("ATU74758256")
- Evidence: Line near top shows "ATU74758256".
- Consistency checks: Prefixed by "ATU" (Austrian VAT format) and located in sender block.
- Confidence: High (≈96%).

Vat.Rate (20)
- Evidence: Line items show "Ust % 20" for each item and VAT group indicated by "Mwst." with amounts consistent with 20%.
- Consistency checks: 118.00 * 0.20 = 23.60 matches VAT amount.
- Formatting rule applied: percentage returned without "%" → "20".
- Confidence: Very high (≈99%).

Net.Amount (118.00)
- Evidence: "Summe excl. Mwst. 118,00" clearly present.
- Consistency checks: Net + VAT = GrandTotal (118,00 + 23,60 = 141,60).
- Confidence: Very high (≈99%).

Vat.Amount (23.60)
- Evidence: "Summe Mwst. 23,60" clearly present.
- Consistency checks: 118.00 * 20% = 23.60; Net + VAT = GrandTotal.
- Confidence: Very high (≈99%).
